suggestions.original: To improve the deformation dimension, consider adding more detail to the body shapes to balance the exaggerated features. While the large heads and big eyes effectively convey emotions, refining the limbs and torso can enhance the overall impact. Additionally, incorporating more dynamic poses and varying the thickness of lines can add depth and interest to the characters. This will help maintain the emotional and conceptual strength of the piece while making the deformations more visually appealing.
